name: cmdmix
description: Butt in that value to your line of commands

scripts.pretty-since-push: { git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d origin/master ; git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d --staged origin/master ; } | sort | uniq | grep -E '\.(scss|css|js|ts|vue|json)$' | xargs prettier
scripts.pretty-commit: { git diff --name-only  --diff-filter=d ; git diff --name-only  --diff-filter=d --staged ; } | sort | uniq | grep -E '\.(scss|css|js|ts|vue|json)$' | xargs prettier
scripts.pretty-all: git ls-tree --full-tree --name-only -r HEAD | grep -E '\.(scss|css|js|ts|vue|json)$' | xargs prettier
